catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 761
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: square writing box with golden wave pattern surrounding a bridge with mother-of-pearl supports; inside: pewter, gold, and mother-of-pearl swans on golden bank with eddies; design of swans inside around ink stone
medium: Black lacquer with sprinkled gold, metal and shell inlay
title: Writing box with bridge and waves
